select sa.announce_id, sa.title, sa.status, sa.comments, sa.create_by, sa.update_by, sa.create_time, sa.update_time, s1.NAME as create_name, s2.NAME as update_name from sys_announce sa join sys_user s1 on sa.create_by = s1.UUID join sys_user s2 on sa.update_by = s2.UUID where sa.announce_id = #{id}

mapper.delete: delete from sys_announce sa where sa.announce_id = #{id}
mapper.select: select allRec.* from ( select sa.announce_id as "announceId", sa.title as "title", sa.status as "status", sa.comments as "comments", sa.create_by as "createBy", sa.update_by as "updateBy", sa.create_time as "createTime", sa.update_time as "updateTime", s1.NAME as "createName", s2.NAME as "updateName" from sys_announce sa join sys_user s1 on sa.create_by = s1.UUID join sys_user s2 on sa.update_by = s2.UUID order by sa.update_time desc ) allRec where 1 = 1 and allRec."status" = #{status}
